movies.title: Ponniyin Selvan-1
movies.cast: Vikram | Aishwarya Rai Bachchan | Jayam Ravi | Karthi | Trisha
movies.about: Vandiyathevan, a brave and brilliant young man sets out to cross the Chola land to deliver a message from the Crown Prince Adithya Karikalan. The narrative deals with attempts by his sister Kundavai to bring back Arulmozhivarman to establish political peace in a land seemingly beset with unrest and civil war plotted by vassals and petty chieftains.

movies.title: Naane Varuen
movies.about: Just when things seem happy and normal in the life of 38 year old Prabhu, his wife Bhuvana and 12 year old daughter Sathya, one vacation changes everything. Sathya`s health starts deteriorating leading to many surprises in Prabhu`s life.Prabhu`s situation in life makes him reconnect with his brother, Kathir, who is a skilled hunter and has an uncanny resemblance to Prabhu. Will Prabhu be able to rekindle the long lost bond with his brother? Will Prabhu`s daughter Sathya`s health improve?

movies.title: Sita ramam
movies.cast: Dulquer Salmaan | Mrunal Thakur | Rashmika Mandanna | Sumanth
movies.about: A long-lost letter must find its way to the recipient twenty years later. A rabble-rouser learns a lesson in humility and love along the way

movies.title: Viruman
movies.about: Viruman is a Tamil movie directed by M Muthaiah, starring Karthik Sivakumar in the lead role.

movies.title: Thiruchitrambalam
movies.about: Thiruchitrambalam, known as Pazham, floats aimlessly through his life as a delivery boy to the disdain of his father. As he tries to get his life on track to no avail, the possibility of love seems to finally bring light into his life.

movies.title: Liger
movies.cast: Vijay Deverakonda | Ananya Panday | Ramya Krishna | Ronit Roy | Vishu Reddy
movies.about: The journey of Liger, from Karimnagar to Mumbai, from a nobody to a competitor, in his search for recognition while navigating his weaknesses, relationships, and love life.

movies.title: Cobra
movies.cast: Vikram | Srinidhi Shetty | Irfan Pathan | Miya George
movies.about: A mathematician genius Mathi who has another identity Cobra who commits intelligent crimes using Maths

movies.title: Natchathiram Nagargirathu
movies.about: niyan (Kalidas Jayaram), Rene (Dushara Vijayan), Arjun (Kalai Arasan) and Madeleine (Manisa Tait) are trying to find themselves and understand their deep-rooted prejudices in life. The film also explores the complexities of contemporary romance and the politics of love in today`s world.

movies.title: Venthu Thaninthathu Kaadu
movies.about: A young village boy Muthu travels to Mumbai to make a living but gets caught in a web of underground activities. Does he get to the top of it all or does he lose it all?

movies.title: Captain
movies.about: The film chronicles the journey of a military officer who is all set to fight aliens.
